description: [APT32](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0050) has used JavaScript for drive-by downloads and C2 communications.(Citation: Cybereason Cobalt Kitty 2017)(Citation: Volexity Ocean Lotus November 2020)

external_references.description: Dahan, A. (2017). Operation Cobalt Kitty. Retrieved December 27, 2018.
Adair, S. and Lancaster, T. (2020, November 6). OceanLotus: Extending Cyber Espionage Operations Through Fake Websites. Retrieved November 20, 2020.
